MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G81 postcode area of Clydebank. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:19pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to locate and repair the fault at the Gran Street substation. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:05pm on Saturday 12th December 2020.
